name: The Apocalypse Sacrifice
description:
The Apocalypse sacrifice is a story-driven adventure game with Fruit Ninja like combat. You are playing as a character who wakes up in a dungeon with no memory. The only clue he has is the note in his mouth.

  Features
  • Unique Combat You can dismember monsters. Destroying monsters’ limbs paralyzes them.
  • Multiple endings Complicated branching in the rich story.
  • Progress The choices you make in the story affect your personality traits. Your attributes are determined by your personality traits.
  • Art hand-painted artwork.
Note

The demo is about an hour long, but you can’t save progress in the current version. It has both English and Traditional Chinese. The BGM is either from Unity asset store or from other stores, so it may sound familiar.

The Game will be released on Android and IOS.

IOS Users

Since demo, betas and trial version can’t be uploaded to App Store, you need to download TestFlight in order to play the demo.
